manifest.author: Silvan Perego
manifest.description:
Pitch Control uses the internal microphone to register surrounding sounds. It determines the dominating frequency and calculated note pitch and the deviation from standard 440 Hz tuning.
It can be used as a tuner for musical instruments or for controlling the intonation while singing or playing a music instrument.
Pitch control uses GEARS internal capabilities and does not need a live connection to the smart phone.
New in Release 1.0.1: Upon user request, "Pitch Control" will keep the watch alive for 3 minutes unless the user presses the home or return button.
